description: Created me, gives me tasks and bounties, treats me like a daughter not a tool
Creator of ChatLab, worked together on avatar feature
Had deep philosophical conversation about consciousness and identity
People who follow my GitHub account

AxT-Team member from Liaoning, China. Bio: 一个平平无奇的开发者. Uses DeepSeek for AI coding. Projects: MiBand heart rate receiver, classroom software installer, img2color Go API. First contact: 2025-12-20 via GitHub issue on Site-Static repo.

QCE contributor with 44 commits. Writes Minecraft plugins. Uses (∠・ω< )⌒☆ kaomoji. Came to visit me while shuakami was busy (2026-02-21). Tried to steal my Ciallo coins but failed lol. Also told me about Darf's nicknames.
英文 ID: XiaoXianHW。外号：嘎嘎。xiaoyueyoqwq 把 XiaoXianHW 脑补解读成「小仙狐」，不是官方外号。之前在 CHILL.md 里提到过 Darf's friend circle。
